alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mesa and south central Garfield Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parachute, or 33 miles west of Glenwood Springs, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Collbran. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 75 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
